name: Crankset V1
description: Crankset converts the power you put into your Ultegra 1x11-speed road bike into propulsion with high efficiency. It meets all your requirements for stiffness and stability.

name: Crankset V2
description: crankset converts the power you put into your Ultegra 2x12-speed road bike groupset into propulsion with high efficiency. It meets all your requirements for stiffness and stability.

name: Rear Derailleur 11-speed
description: Rear derailleur impresses with a super powerful servo motor and shifting at the touch of a button, which is highly accurate even under extreme load or in difficult conditions.

name: Cassette 11-speed
description: This 11-speed cassette ensures smooth but reliable gear changes when downshifting and upshifting thanks to HG-EV technology. Eevery rider will find the right gradation.

name: Cranks
description: This crank is characterised by durability, stiffness and its low weight. It can be ridden as FC-M8000-1 with a single chainring (not included). Two chainrings can also be installed

name: Front Derailleur 2-/11 Speed
description: This front derailleur is an electronic front derailleur for two chainrings that shifts smoothly and quickly even under high loads. Thanks to materials such as carbon, titanium and aluminium. Thats why it is very lightweight.

name: Mountain Bike Frameset V1
description: The RAAW Mountain Bikes Madonna V2.2 frame shines with thoughtful details that focus on robustness and durability for enduro use. Everyone can enjoy the same level of riding fun.

name: Mountain Bike Frameset V2
description: The RAAW Mountain Bikes Madonna V2.2 frame shines with thoughtful details that focus on robustness and durability for enduro use. Everyone can enjoy the same level of riding fun.
